email.description: An email address that identifies a user profile in Iterable. Provide an email or a userId (but not both), depending on how your project identifies users.

userId.description: A user ID that identifies a user profile in Iterable. Provide an email or a userId (but not both), depending on how your project identifies users.

dataFields.description: Additional data associated with event (i.e. item amount, item quantity). For events of the same name, identically named data fields must be of the same type.

profile_updated_at.description: when the profile was last updated. Expects a unix timestamp.
